title: Body Moves 1990 (Dance, Romance) Lindsley Allen, Kirk Rivera, Steve Messina | Full Movie

sources.title: Body Moves 1990 (Dance, Romance) Lindsley Allen, Kirk Rivera, Steve Messina | Full Movie
sources.description:
Feel The Heat!
The battle between two dance groups is called the "Hot Steps Contest", a competition to be held at the Neptune disco.

Original title: Hot steps - passi caldi

Director: Gerry Lively
Writer: Daniele Stroppa
Stars: Lindsley Allen, Kirk Rivera, Steve Messina
Genres: Musical, Romantic Comedy, Dance


00:00 Full movie
00:15 Dance audition, medical treatment, and morning routine unfold as characters navigate relationships and aspirations.
11:30 Dance group prepares for contest, faces challenges and conflicts.
23:42 A story of dance, romance, and financial struggles unfolds, involving a group of characters and their relationships.
35:20 Drama unfolds as a dance school faces closure due to financial struggles and personal conflicts.
43:45 Dance rehearsals face challenges as relationships and health issues arise, leading to conflicts and a risky plan to continue practicing.
56:58 Drama unfolds as relationships are tested, secrets are revealed, and a dangerous encounter occurs late at night.
1:09:37 Romantic drama involving jealousy, betrayal, and friendship, leading to a dance contest and a new love interest.
1:21:34 Dance competition drama unfolds as Nancy faces health challenges, but with support, she overcomes obstacles and the group delivers a successful performance.
1:30:51 Dance performance with technical difficulties and deliberation by judges.

@CultCinemaClassics .
